traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The serpentfolk can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The serpentfolk makes two scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Scimitar
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13). Until this {@action grapple} ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the serpentfolk can't constrict another target.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The serpentfolk's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
